reviewtext: This is an incredible camera, especially in regard to its low-light capabilities. I used mine for years, but as Windows OS versions changed, the camera became less and less cooperative with the PC, and with Windows 7 finally stopped working completely. (It didn't do that well with XP, either).So, if you're running an OS older than XP, you can't go wrong with this camera; especially at this price!
summary: Super Camera, but not supported for WinXP or above.
